    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Function for updating all major functionalities of this module.

      • updateSupplyTriggerPoint

        private void updateSupplyTriggerPoint()
        Function for updating the trigger point at which new supply providers are being needed. This function ensures a dynamic construction of these.

      • buildSupplyIfNeeded

        private void buildSupplyIfNeeded()
        Function for constructing supply providers if the current supply is below the previously calculated trigger point. It has a time stamp as a safety feature since buildings cannot be constructed immediately.

      • generateMaxConcurrentQueuedElements

        private int generateMaxConcurrentQueuedElements()
        Function for generating the maximum allowed number of currently present elements that are forwarded into the UnitControlModule Queue.
        Returns:
        the maximum number of elements that are allowed to be in the Queue at the same time.

      • extractFreeFacilitiesCount

        private int extractFreeFacilitiesCount(java.util.List<bwapi.UnitType> facilityTypes)
        Function for extracting the number of training facilities that are currently not active and therefore not training any Unit.
        Parameters:
        facilityTypes - the UnitTypes that are counted as training facilities.
        Returns:
        the number of training facilities that are not currently training any Unit.
